::Dark Lavacons::

      Astral gets hit by both Zardus and Oblitertron's s=
hots, and goes flying back and hits a tree, burning it down.  Astral got up=
, and laughed evilly, as if the pain felt good to him or something(No, they=
're not invincible).

     Astral fired his rocket launcher at Zardus, cack=
ling.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox is hit by Oblitertr=
on in the chest, and falls down.  Fenox got back up, and started running, a=
nd shooting optic lazers at Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~
Starlight was hit by Zardus' plasma launcher, and she was sent ba=
ckwards in a flip.  Starlight let out an evil, piercing shriek, and black f=
ire came out of her mouth.  The black fire touched the ground, and the grou=
nd started burning in black flame.

       Starlight started shooting her c=
rossbow at Zardus and Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~
Griplash looked at Starlight, and laughed in evil laughter, as he went =
over to a boulder, waved his hand, and burnt the boulder in black fire.  Gr=
iplash grabbed his sword, and started slashing at things, burning the area =
in dark fire, mindlessly, ignoring Zardus and Oblitertron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa got her gatling guns, and started sho=
oting dark fire everywhere.


(Now, the Dark Lavacons are getting reckless,=
 except for Starlight, Astral and Fenox, who are still mindless and destruc=
tive, but are fighting Oblitertron and Zardus)
